availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Xenophen Sine (Campbell County JP and circuit clerk, teacher)

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, clerk. New Jersey native. Married to Susan Maria Wilson Hine in Hamilton County, Ohio, on November 15, 1843. Father of Mary Sine and Elania Sine. School teacher in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Justice of the peace and clerk of the Campbell Circuit Court in Campbell County in 1860 and 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 5B.
